import { Button, Grid, Icon, Image, List } from "semantic-ui-react" import { formatCurrency } from "./../helpers/number-helper" const MenuItem = ({ item, viewDetail, addToCart }) => { const { image, name, price, description, id } = item return ( {name} {formatCurrency(price)} {description}
{viewDetail && ( <> )} {addToCart && ( )}
) } export default MenuItem
